control.description-key: Allow you to fill in Docx template files within Canvas Apps.

property.name: templateData
property.description-key: Data that will be used to fill in the template. You can utilize the JSON function within your app to generate this string.

property.name: docxTemplate
property.description-key: This should be the Base64 content of the Docx Template.

property.name: docxOutput
property.description-key: The final filled Docx in Base64 string format

property.name: outputErrorMessage
property.description-key: If there is an error during the function call the message will be provided here.

property.name: outputError
property.description-key: If there is an error during the function call this value will be true.

property.name: fillTemplate
property.description-key: Setting this value to true will start the fill of the template.
